description: A quality task (qTask) defines why data is exchanged between 2 or more companies and what insights should be generated out of the transferred data. In addition there is a flag, what happens with the transferred data when this qTask is closed

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_1.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_io.catenax.quality_task_2.0.0_S.description: Enumeration of the different status values

urn_samm_io.catenax.quality_task_2.0.0_D.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.quality_task_2.0.0_D.description: Enumeration of possible data deletions entries.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two uppercase letters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.contact_infor.description: Regular expression for mail address as defined in W3C.

urn_samm_io.catenax.quality_task_2.0.0_C.description: One company involved in this qTask

urn_samm_io.catenax.quality_task_2.0.0_L.description: A list of all companies involved in this qTask
